oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nicholas Katzenbach honored at breakfast at Judge Weldon White’s, 1962 April 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Nicholas Katzenbach (left) and Tennessee Governor Ellington (right) on April 27th, 1962 in Nashville, Tennessee. There was also another honorary event held at Judge Weldon White’s, Justice Tennessee Supreme Court 1961-1967. Katzenbach served in the U. S. Department of Justice as Assistant Attorney General of the Office of Legal Counsel in 1961-1962 and as Deputy Attorney General from 1962 to 1965. Ben West served as Mayor of Nashville from 1951-1963. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Katzenbach, Nicholas deB. (Nicholas deBelleville), 1922-2012; Ellington, Buford, 1907-1972
